DOC.brief_summary: To compare ocular tolerance , safety ocular pharmacokinetics 3 concentration ( 0.5 % - 1.0 % - 1.5 % ) vehicle T1225 one drop instillation
DOC.brief_title: Ocular Tolerance , Safety Ocular Pharmacokinetics After 1 Drop T1225 0.5 , 1.0 , 1.5 % 48 Healthy Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: The aim present study compare ocular tolerance , safety ocular pharmacokinetics single administration T1225 eye drop ( 0.5 % , 1.0 % , 1.5 % ) healthy volunteer .
DOC.criteria: Male female age 18 45 year old ; Written inform consent ; Healthy volunteer ( without ocular symptom ) ; Normal ocular examination eye ( correct visual acuity ( VA ) > = 6/10 Slit lamp examination without clinical relevant abnormality Tear breakup time ( BUT ) â‰¥10 second Lachrymal secretion Schirmer test > = 10 mm 5 minute Lissamine green test total score < 4 + ) . Ocular trauma , infection inflammation within last 3 month ; Blepharitis ; Conjunctival hyperaemia ( score > = 2 + ) ; Watering ( score > = 2 ) ; Contact lenses ; Ocular surgery , include LASIK PRK , within last 12 month ; Topical ocular treatment within last month ; Systemic antibiotic within last 7 day ; Any medication study ( except : Paracetamol contraceptive ) .
